faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Renting a Shop in Sector 28 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Find quick and comprehensive answers to the most common queries regarding commercial property rentals lease terms and market conditions in this high-demand Gurugram sector.

faqs.question: What is the typical lock-in period for a shop for rent in Sector 28
faqs.answer: Standard commercial rental agreements in Sector 28 usually include a mandatory lock-in period typically ranging from 12 to 36 months depending on the size of the space and the investment made by the landlord in tenant improvements. This lock-in ensures stability for both parties. You must review the lease agreement carefully to understand the exact duration and penalties if any for breaking the lease prematurely before committing to the rental.

faqs.question: How is the security deposit calculated for commercial shops here
faqs.answer: The security deposit for commercial shops in Sector 28 Gurugram generally averages between three to six months worth of the agreed monthly rent. This amount is held by the landlord as security against property damage or non-payment of rent. The exact figure is negotiable but typically aligns with market standards for prime commercial real estate in the area.

faqs.question: Are there additional monthly costs besides the base rent
faqs.answer: Yes in addition to the base rent you should budget for common area maintenance CAM charges electricity and water consumption and potentially a sinking fund for major building repairs. If the property is located within a commercial complex expect society maintenance fees which cover shared facilities security and waste management. Always clarify all inclusive costs before signing the rental contract.

faqs.question: What documentation is required to rent a commercial shop in Sector 28
faqs.answer: To secure a commercial shop rental you will typically need identity proof address proof valid PAN and Aadhar cards your GST registration certificate business registration documents and financial statements or bank records for verification. Corporate tenants may require board resolutions and MoA/AoA copies. We help streamline the documentation process for a quick lease finalization.

faqs.question: What are the common lease duration options available in this area
faqs.answer: Commercial leases in Sector 28 usually range from three to five years initially with provisions for renewal subject to mutual agreement. Shorter leases of 11 months are rare for dedicated commercial spaces but are sometimes available for micro-retail units. Long-term leases are preferred by landlords to ensure tenant stability.

faqs.question: Can I renovate or modify the rented commercial space
faqs.answer: Any significant structural modifications or major renovations require explicit written permission from the landlord before commencement. Minor cosmetic changes like painting or shelving installation are usually permissible but should be detailed in the agreement. Clarify who bears the cost of returning the shop to its original condition at the end of the tenancy.

faqs.question: What are the advantages of renting a corner shop versus a middle shop
faqs.answer: Corner shops offer superior visibility from two directions maximizing brand exposure and foot traffic drawing power. They are ideal for brands needing impact. Middle shops are generally cheaper to rent and offer high exposure within the flow of the main market lane. The choice depends on your budget visibility requirements and business type.

faqs.question: Is Sector 28 suitable for food and beverage businesses
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Sector 28 is excellent for F&B businesses due to its large residential base and proximity to offices. However ensure the rental property has adequate provision for kitchen exhaust ventilation gas line setup and grease traps if required. Necessary health and trade licenses must also be secured prior to operation.

faqs.question: How quickly can I finalize a deal and move into a rental shop here
faqs.answer: Once you have selected a Shop For Rent in Sector 28 and negotiated terms the process typically takes one to two weeks. This timeframe covers due diligence agreement drafting stamping and signing. Factors like existing tenancy clearance and necessary repairs can sometimes extend this duration slightly.

faqs.question: Are property management services included with the rental
faqs.answer: Generally property management services are separate from the base rent. Landlords or building associations handle common area maintenance CAM which covers external upkeep and shared utilities. Internal maintenance and repairs specific to your shop are usually the tenant's responsibility unless specified otherwise in the lease agreement.
